org.apache.juneau.xml

Class XmlParserContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Context
      • org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserContext
        • org.apache.juneau.xml.XmlParserContext

  • public final class XmlParserContext
extends ParserContext
    Configurable properties on the XmlParser class.

    Context properties are set by calling ContextFactory.setProperty(String, Object) on the context factory returned CoreApi.getContextFactory().

    The following convenience methods are also provided for setting context properties:

    • XmlParser.setProperty(String,Object)
    • XmlParser.setProperties(ObjectMap)
    • XmlParser.addNotBeanClasses(Class[])
    • XmlParser.addBeanFilters(Class[])
    • XmlParser.addPojoSwaps(Class[])
    • XmlParser.addImplClass(Class,Class)

    See ContextFactory for more information about context properties.

    Author:
    James Bognar (james.bognar@salesforce.com)

      • XML_xsiNs

        public static final String XML_xsiNs
        XMLSchema-instance namespace URI (String, default="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance").

        The XMLSchema namespace.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_trimWhitespace

        public static final String XML_trimWhitespace
        Trim whitespace from text elements (Boolean, default=true).

        If true, whitespace in text elements will be automatically trimmed.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_validating

        public static final String XML_validating
        Set validating mode (Boolean, default=false).

        If true, XML document will be validated. See XMLInputFactory.IS_VALIDATING for more info.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_coalescing

        public static final String XML_coalescing
        Set coalescing mode (Boolean, default=false).

        If true, XML text elements will be coalesced. See XMLInputFactory.IS_COALESCING for more info.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_replaceEntityReferences

        public static final String XML_replaceEntityReferences
        Replace entity references (Boolean, default=true).

        If true, entity references will be replace during parsing. See XMLInputFactory.IS_REPLACING_ENTITY_REFERENCES for more info.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_reporter

        public static final String XML_reporter
        XML reporter (XMLReporter, default=null).

        Associates an XMLReporter with this parser.

        Note: Reporters are not copied to new parsers during a clone.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final String XML_resolver
        XML resolver (XMLResolver, default=null).

        Associates an XMLResolver with this parser.

      • XML_eventAllocator

        public static final String XML_eventAllocator
        XML event allocator. (XMLEventAllocator, default=false).

        Associates an XMLEventAllocator with this parser.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_preserveRootElement

        public static final String XML_preserveRootElement
        Preserve root element during generalized parsing (Boolean, default=false).

        If true, when parsing into a generic ObjectMap, the map will contain a single entry whose key is the root element name. Example:

        XML ObjectMap.toString(), preserveRootElement==false ObjectMap.toString(), preserveRootElement==true
        <root><a>foobar</a></root> { a:'foobar' } { root: { a:'foobar' }}
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
